I think this PR introduced a superfluous .mul_(momentum) on line 90. (line 98 in current version of SGD)

Since buf is initialized to be zero, multiplying it by momentum should be a no-op and wastes cycles. Or am I missing something ?

body:
I think this PR introduced a superfluous `.mul_(momentum)` on [line 90](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/3139/files#diff-a8057161021fbbff400dbb48284f5eedR90). ([line 98](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/optim/sgd.py#L98) in current version of `SGD`)

Since `buf` is initialized to be zero, multiplying it by `momentum` should be a no-op and wastes cycles. Or am I missing something ?
